verses.text: We \w have|strong="H1121"\w* heard \w with|strong="H1121"\w* our ears, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God; our fathers \w have|strong="H1121"\w* told us \w the|strong="H1121"\w* work You did \w in|strong="H1121"\w* their days, \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* days \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w With|strong="H3117"\w* \w Your|strong="H8085"\w* hand \w You|strong="H3117"\w* drove \w out|strong="H6466"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* nations \w and|strong="H3117"\w* planted \w our|strong="H8085"\w* fathers \w there|strong="H3117"\w*; \w You|strong="H3117"\w* crushed \w the|strong="H8085"\w* peoples \w and|strong="H3117"\w* cast \w them|strong="H8085"\w* \w out|strong="H6466"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3027"\w* \w it|strong="H3423"\w* \w was|strong="H3027"\w* \w not|strong="H1471"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w their|strong="H3423"\w* \w sword|strong="H3027"\w* \w that|strong="H1471"\w* \w they|strong="H3027"\w* \w took|strong="H3423"\w* \w the|strong="H3423"\w* land; \w their|strong="H3423"\w* \w arm|strong="H3027"\w* did \w not|strong="H1471"\w* \w bring|strong="H7489"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w* victory. \w It|strong="H3423"\w* \w was|strong="H3027"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w Your|strong="H7971"\w* right \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w Your|strong="H7971"\w* \w arm|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H3423"\w* light \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w Your|strong="H7971"\w* face, \w because|strong="H3027"\w* \w You|strong="H7971"\w* favored \w them|strong="H7971"\w*.

\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w King|strong="H6440"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*, \w who|strong="H3588"\w* ordains victories \w for|strong="H3588"\w* Jacob.
Through \w You|strong="H6680"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* repel \w our|strong="H6680"\w* foes; through \w Your|strong="H6680"\w* name \w we|strong="H3068"\w* trample \w our|strong="H6680"\w* enemies.

\w For|strong="H8034"\w* \w I|strong="H6862"\w* do \w not|strong="H6965"\w* trust \w in|strong="H8034"\w* \w my|strong="H6965"\w* bow, \w nor|strong="H8034"\w* does \w my|strong="H6965"\w* sword save \w me|strong="H8034"\w*.\f + \fr 44:6 \ft Or give me victory; similarly in verse 7\f*

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w save|strong="H3467"\w* \w us|strong="H3588"\w* \w from|strong="H2719"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* enemies; \w You|strong="H3588"\w* put \w those|strong="H3467"\w* \w who|strong="H3588"\w* hate \w us|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H3808"\w* shame.

\w In|strong="H3588"\w* God \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H6862"\w* boasted \w all|strong="H3467"\w* day long, \w and|strong="H6862"\w* \w Your|strong="H3588"\w* name \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3588"\w* \w praise|strong="H3588"\w* forever. Selah

\w But|strong="H3605"\w* \w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w have|strong="H3117"\w* rejected \w and|strong="H3117"\w* humbled \w us|strong="H3117"\w*; \w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w no|strong="H3605"\w* \w longer|strong="H5769"\w* \w go|strong="H1984"\w* \w forth|strong="H1984"\w* \w with|strong="H3117"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* armies.

\w You|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* made \w us|strong="H2186"\w* retreat \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* foe, \w and|strong="H3318"\w* \w those|strong="H3318"\w* \w who|strong="H6635"\w* hate \w us|strong="H2186"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* plundered \w us|strong="H2186"\w*.

\w You|strong="H7725"\w* \w have|strong="H6862"\w* given \w us|strong="H7725"\w* \w up|strong="H4480"\w* \w as|strong="H7725"\w* \w sheep|strong="H4480"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w be|strong="H7725"\w* devoured; \w You|strong="H7725"\w* \w have|strong="H6862"\w* scattered \w us|strong="H7725"\w* \w among|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* nations.

\w You|strong="H5414"\w* \w sell|strong="H5414"\w* \w Your|strong="H5414"\w* \w people|strong="H1471"\w* \w for|strong="H5414"\w* nothing; \w no|strong="H5414"\w* profit do \w You|strong="H5414"\w* gain \w from|strong="H1471"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* sale.

\w You|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H5971"\w* \w made|strong="H7235"\w* \w us|strong="H5971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* reproach \w to|strong="H5971"\w* \w our|strong="H5971"\w* neighbors, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* mockery \w and|strong="H5971"\w* derision \w to|strong="H5971"\w* those around \w us|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w You|strong="H7760"\w* have \w made|strong="H7760"\w* \w us|strong="H5439"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* byword \w among|strong="H2781"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* nations, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* laughingstock \f + \fr 44:14 \ft Literally a shaking of the head\f* \w among|strong="H2781"\w* \w the|strong="H7760"\w* peoples.
All day long \w my|strong="H7760"\w* disgrace \w is|strong="H7218"\w* before \w me|strong="H7760"\w*, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* shame \w has|strong="H1471"\w* covered \w my|strong="H7760"\w* face,

\w at|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* voice \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* scorner \w and|strong="H3117"\w* reviler, \w because|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* enemy, bent \w on|strong="H3117"\w* revenge.

\w All|strong="H6440"\w* \w this|strong="H6440"\w* has come \w upon|strong="H6440"\w* \w us|strong="H6440"\w*, though \w we|strong="H3068"\w* have \w not|strong="H6440"\w* forgotten \w You|strong="H6440"\w* \w or|strong="H6963"\w* betrayed \w Your|strong="H6440"\w* covenant.

\w Our|strong="H3605"\w* hearts \w have|strong="H3605"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* turned back; \w our|strong="H3605"\w* steps \w have|strong="H3605"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* strayed \w from|strong="H3605"\w* \w Your|strong="H3605"\w* path.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w You|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* crushed \w us|strong="H4480"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* lair \w of|strong="H4480"\w* jackals;\f + \fr 44:19 \ft Or serpents or dragons\f* \w You|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* covered \w us|strong="H4480"\w* \w with|strong="H3820"\w* deepest darkness.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* forgotten \w the|strong="H5921"\w* name \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* God \w or|strong="H3588"\w* spread \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H5921"\w* hands \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* foreign god,
\w would|strong="H8034"\w* not God \w have|strong="H2114"\w* discovered, since \w He|strong="H3709"\w* knows \w the|strong="H7911"\w* secrets \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H7911"\w* heart?

\w Yet|strong="H3588"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w Your|strong="H3045"\w* sake \w we|strong="H3068"\w* face death \w all|strong="H3045"\w* day long; \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3045"\w* \w considered|strong="H3820"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* sheep \w to|strong="H3820"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* slaughtered.\f + \fr 44:22 \ft Cited in Romans 8:36\f*

Wake \w up|strong="H5921"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* Lord! \w Why|strong="H5921"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w* sleeping? Arise! \w Do|strong="H3605"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* reject \w us|strong="H5921"\w* \w forever|strong="H3605"\w*.
\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w do|strong="H4100"\w* \w You|strong="H4100"\w* hide \w Your|strong="H4100"\w* face \w and|strong="H3462"\w* forget our affliction \w and|strong="H3462"\w* oppression?

\w For|strong="H6440"\w* \w our|strong="H6440"\w* soul \w has|strong="H4100"\w* sunk \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* dust; \w our|strong="H6440"\w* bodies cling \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* earth.
Rise up; \w be|strong="H5315"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* help! Redeem \w us|strong="H3588"\w* on account \w of|strong="H5315"\w* \w Your|strong="H3588"\w* loving devotion.
